20101205160653.000|20101205160655.000|CCO|>>> JOINING ME NOW, GENERAL 
20101205160655.000|20101205160657.000|CCO|WESLEY CLARK, FORMER NATO 
20101205160657.000|20101205160659.000|CCO|SUPREME ALLIED COMMANDER.
20101205160659.000|20101205160701.000|CCO|HE SUPPORTS THE REPEAL OF DON'T 
20101205160701.000|20101205160702.250|CCO|ASK, DON'T TELL.
20101205160702.250|20101205160703.500|CCO|LIEUTENANT COLONEL BOB MAGINNIS.
20101205160703.500|20101205160704.750|CCO|HE SERVED IN THE U.S. ARMY FOR 
20101205160704.750|20101205160706.000|CCO|24 YEARS.
20101205160706.000|20101205160707.250|CCO|HE WAS AN ADVISER TO THE 1993
